name: Tall Child
description:
Description

A 2D infinite runner game made for the Mix and Game Jam. The main game mechanic was inspired from the Uproots in Super Mario Odyssey.
You play as a child on the run from an unknown threat. Use your unnaturally stretchy legs to jump through the derelict woods and get as high of a score as you can!

Controls
  • SPACE: Stretch legs & Jump
  • R: Restart
  • ESCAPE: Pause Menu
Credits

In game font: Early GameBoy by Jimmy Campbell
